content.html: hey - you can block people, it’s fine! but blocking people because they’ve written light-hearted criticism of you *might* suggest you don’t actually have a unique, thought-out devotion to promoting debate on social media here’s the article anyway ft.com/content/ee5aa1…
content.value:
hey - you can block people, it’s fine! but blocking people because they’ve written light-hearted criticism of you *might* suggest you don’t actually have a unique, thought-out devotion to promoting debate on social media 

here’s the article anyway ft.com/content/ee5aa1…
